node.title: Operation Rainfall: Get around region locking, play Xenoblade this August
node.excerpt: Hi everyone, this is my first blog on MyIGN. I've had an account here on IGN since 2003 and have been a long time lurker. This is a brief article I wrote up about something that I'm sure many people will find interesting. Enjoy! Please leave any comments or questions, I'll get back to them all. Promise!
